text: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to make the second expression negative. This will make the second part of the problem $$-4x^3+6x^3+x-7$$. Now we can combine like terms.

title: Combining $$x^3$$ Terms
text: $$-7x^3$$ and $$-4x^3$$ are the only terms being multiplied by $$x^3$$, we can add these constants to simplify the $$x^3$$ term. $$-7+\left(-4\right)=-11$$, so the $$x^3$$ term becomes $$-11x^3$$.
